org.eclipse.kura.net.modem

Interface ModemInterfaceAddress

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NetInterfaceAddress
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ModemInterfaceAddressConfig

    public interface ModemInterfaceAddress
extends NetInterfaceAddress
    Modem Interface Address represents the modem state
